subject: Re: Changes to https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/
preview: Hello Stella,Sorry for the back and forth replies. I've made sure that the "antivirus" texts are all changed to "antiviral" including the badges. https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/Please l

full_threads.body:
Hello Stella,

Sorry for the back and forth replies. I've made sure that the "antivirus" texts are all changed to "antiviral" including the badges. 

https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/

Please let us know if you would like further changes.
@rica I have updated that now too, Thanks. Please let the client know. No extra time from me.
@heath done with the rest of the task here, just need to have the badges to be updated to "ANTIVIRAL"

Hello Rica,

This one hasnt been done...?


Could you also please change antivirus to antiviral in the following 4 instances:


Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella,

Sure. Confirming that we have replaced the badges for antibacterial, antifungal and antiviral. Please let us know if you would like further changes.
@rica I have attached the new image, can you please change and let the client know? Thanks!

Apologies, also antibacterial, antifungal and antiviral should actually be one word, not hyphenated. So wherever on the website that these words appear, please replace them:

anti-bacterial replace with antibacterial
anti-fungal replace with antifungal
anti-virus replace with antiviral

Including on these badges please... Thanks


Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Rica has asked me to look at this page: https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/

Let me know if you happy with the changes? I think it works well, but let me know if you have something different in mind. I'm cautious not to go 'too crazy' with the green bar at the top as it's going to push everything quite far down the page.

Logged 5 mins to Harvest

@heath kindly check, thanks!

@rica done updating
- move green box to top as a banner
- center all elements in blue box
- check boxes, transfer one line of text to right column to make balance

time: 5mins
@jaime can you please take a look at the client's instructions, please? then proceed from there...

Hello Rica,

Sorry a few things done wrong here -

The page was supposed to be formatted in the order i gave it to you - so the green 'it's antibacterial' box should've come first, and we also want this done properly by Heath or one of the team to be a professional advert, as mentioned on the brief.

Also the dot points, one of them might as well go from the left column to the right to balance them up. Not sure why this wasn't seen before this and done?!

Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Thanks @jaime 

Logged total of 20 mins to Harvest

Hi Stella,

Hope this finds you well. Confirming that we have made the updates to Durasafe 3000 Series page and ready for you to review.

Here's the link: https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

@jaime can you please help me with task 2? Thanks!

2. Then add a box (make a bit of a marketing banner out of it) the same as the WOULD YOU LIKE SOME COLOUR SWATCHES box that says:

It's anti-bacterial, anti-fungal and anti-virus.
Durasafe has you covered.
(you could use the 'anti' badges as a background image maybe, or the table and virus image used in blog https://duracube.com.au/one-simple-way-to-reduce-the-spread-of-viruses-in-australia/ - whatever looks best)

The rest are done.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath/Rica,

Could this page https://duracube.com.au/durasafe-3000-series/ please be updated as below?

Thanks

1. Please move the WOULD YOU LIKE SOME COLOUR SWATCHES box down below the 3 antifungal, antivirus, antibacterial badges

2. Then add a box (make a bit of a marketing banner out of it) the same as the WOULD YOU LIKE SOME COLOUR SWATCHES box that says:

It's anti-bacterial, anti-fungal and anti-virus.
Durasafe has you covered.
(you could use the 'anti' badges as a background image maybe, or the table and virus image used in blog https://duracube.com.au/one-simple-way-to-reduce-the-spread-of-viruses-in-australia/ - whatever looks best)

3. Then change the text below to read as follows:

Our Durasafe 13mm Compact Laminate range is an antibacterial, antifungal and antivirus surface solution, which we import ensuring the most advanced and protective laminate, backed with competitive pricing. Durasafe compact laminate offers everything a commercial bathroom ever needs:

  • Always antibacterial and antifungal, our compact laminate is now also antivirus
  • Tested here in Australia by a certified laboratory using internationally recognised ASTM E1053 test method
  • Hygienic and easy to clean and maintain
  • Resistant to all harmful germs and cleaning agents
  • Noise deafening system to avoid disturbing "door banging" sound
  • Wide spectrum of colours to choose from
  • High wear and abrasion resistance
  • Manufactured in strict adherence to accepted fire safety norms
  • Best in class international accessories
  • Equipped with emergency opening provisions
  • Resistant to cigarette burns
  • Exceptional water, humidity and high-temperature resistance.

4. Then centre the 3 'anti' badges, not left justified. Then under the badges should be the blue box WOULD YOU LIKE SOME COLOUR SAMPLES from the top.

The rest is good to remain the same. Thanks



Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
